mapper.insert:

id,
project_id,

bifidobacterium,
lactic_acid_bacteria,

mapper.update:
update animal_gut_microbiota_record
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
animal_id = #{animalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
e_coli = #{eColi,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
bifidobacterium = #{bifidobacterium,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lactic_acid_bacteria = #{lacticAcidBacteria,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
total_bacteria = #{totalBacteria,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
live_yeast = #{liveYeast,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update animal_gut_microbiota_record set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, animal_id = #{animalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_coli = #{eColi,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bifidobacterium = #{bifidobacterium,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lactic_acid_bacteria = #{lacticAcidBacteria,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_bacteria = #{totalBacteria,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, live_yeast = #{liveYeast,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update.foreach:
update animal_gut_microbiota_record
project_id = #{item.projectId},
user_id = #{item.userId},
animal_id = #{item.animalId},
e_coli = #{item.eColi},
bifidobacterium = #{item.bifidobacterium},
lactic_acid_bacteria = #{item.lacticAcidBacteria},
total_bacteria = #{item.totalBacteria},
live_yeast = #{item.liveYeast},
where id = #{item.id}
